column4: !help: I suddenly have no sound. In the sound preferences program says I don't have any application playing or recording audio. If I open rythmbox, and try to play a song, the song stays in 0:00 and does not move on. The sound was working good minutes ago. Is there a way to restart the sound, alsa restart or something like that?
also, Im on an old linux mint. so its use lucid packages that have almost no updates
We do not support Mint here. Please seek support in #linuxmint-help on irc.spotchat.org
